item.title: AWS Blue/Green Deployments with Launch Templates
item.description: While working on migrating our CodeDeploys to Blue/Green deployments, I ran into a bug with AWS CodeDeploy. Specificaly, we are using LaunchTemplates with our AutoScaling groups.
